column4: Could anyone help me? I can.t run my normal Ubuntu couse Grub2 buged after installing windows to 2nd partition. When I try to fix it, I fail, couse my I named stuff badly (media/Ubuntu HDD) , need to rename it, that it would have no spaces, any suggestions?
id you are refering to the MOUNT POINT name. thats changeable in the /etc/fstab file
Theres no such thing in there, only : aufs / aufs rw 0 0 tmpfs /tmp tmpfs nosuid,nodev 0 0 /dev/sda5 swap swap defaults 0 0
